name: Annual Science Fair
description: Present your innovative science projects to peers and judges. Prizes awarded for top experiments and displays.

name: Interschool Basketball Tournament
description: Join our school's basketball team in a thrilling tournament against rival schools. Show your school spirit!

name: Creative Writing Workshop
description: Learn advanced writing techniques from published authors. Perfect for aspiring writers and English enthusiasts.

name: Environmental Awareness Day
short_description: Make a difference in our community
description: Participate in local clean-up efforts and learn about sustainable practices. Certificate of participation provided.

name: Career Exploration Fair
description: Meet professionals from various fields and learn about different career opportunities. Great for juniors and seniors!

name: Annual Talent Show
description: Perform your special talent in front of the school. Singing, dancing, magic tricks - all talents welcome!

name: Robotics Club Kickoff
description: Join the exciting world of robotics! Learn to build and program robots for competitions and fun projects.

name: Mock United Nations Conference
description: Represent a country in our school's Model UN. Develop public speaking and diplomacy skills while addressing world problems.

name: Spring Musical Auditions
short_description: Be part of this year's musical
description: Audition for roles in our school's production of 'Grease'. Singers, actors, and backstage crew needed!

name: Peer Tutoring Program
description: Volunteer as a peer tutor or sign up to receive tutoring in various subjects. Great for your college applications!
